roleset.name: to manage, distribute, or apply
roleset.note: ADMINISTER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls contribute-13.2-1-1. (from administer.01-v)
ADMINISTRATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry administer.01, OntoNotes grouping administration-n senses 2& 3; maps to VN class contribute-13.2. Framed by Claire. (from administration.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Worse , it remained to [a well-meaning but naive president of the United States]-1 *PRO*-1 to administer the final infamy upon those who fought and died in Vietnam .
example.arg: *PRO*-1 (= a well-meaning but naive president of the United States)
upon those who fought and died in Vietnam

example.name: unspecified subject
example.text: The idea would be *PRO* to administer to patients the growth-controlling proteins made [*] by healthy versions of the damaged genes .
example.arg: the growth-controlling proteins made by healthy versions of the damaged genes

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: I have a degree in business administration.

example.name: Arg 0 only
example.text: The island has remained under French administration.

example.name: Arg 1, distribute sense
example.text: The patient fell asleep after the administration of a sedative.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Puckett closely monitored his administration of drugs to Hobbs.
